TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SignatureSummary extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: A type that is giving information about the signature status.
Docs.remarks: This type is used as a bit vector giving a summary of the signature status. It provides an easy interface to a defined semantic of the signature status. Checking just one bit is sufficient to see whether a signature is valid without any restrictions.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.SignatureSummary BadPolicy = int32(1024)

Docs.summary: A policy requirement was not met.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.SignatureSummary CRLMissing = int32(256)

Docs.summary: The CRL (or an equivalent mechanism) is not available.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.SignatureSummary CRLTooOld = int32(512)
.field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.SignatureSummary Green = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The signature is good but one might want to display some extra information. Check the other bits.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.SignatureSummary KeyExpired = int32(32)

Docs.summary: The key or one of the certificates has expired. It is probably a good idea to display the date of the expiration.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.SignatureSummary KeyMissing = int32(128)

Docs.summary: Can't verify due to a missing key or certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.SignatureSummary KeyRevoked = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The key or at least one certificate has been revoked.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.SignatureSummary Red = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The signature is bad. It might be useful to check other bits and display more information, i.e. a revoked certificate might not render a signature invalid when the message was received prior to the cause for the revocation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.SignatureSummary SignatureExpired = int32(64)
.field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.SignatureSummary SysError = int32(2048)
.field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.SignatureSummary Valid = int32(1)
